barker_notes.barker_summary: Convention between Santanistas and Bustamantistas, July 6, 1832. Guerra and Mexia unite forces to suppress insurgent movement reported from Texas. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 811

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Convention between Santanistas and Bustamantistas, July 6, 1832. Guerra and Mexia unite forces to suppress insurgent movement reported from Texas. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Matamoros*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="07-06-1832">July 6, 1832.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
